name: Down Under Dash
description:
As a backpacker everyone talks about how Australia is a wonderful destination. You get a chance to be up close and personal with the adorable koalas…

“WATCH OUT FOR THE DROP BEARS”.

And observe the majestic emus roam the rolling plains…

“THEY’RE COMING FROM BEHIND”

Of course, you can’t have an Australian trip without an encounter with the iconic kangaroos…

“WAIT… DID THEY JUST PULL OUT BOXING GLOVES FROM THEIR POUCHES?!”.

Make sure to share all your new experiences with your friends and family.

“WILL I EVER GET HOME?”.

---

Run, jump and duck your way about the Australian outback.
